title: What is the concept of "Becoming a Motivating Symbol"?
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discussed the ideas of various experts on hypnosis, including J.P. Jagot and Gil Boyne. last_phrase: In conclusion, the shift towards an outward direction in life, as explained through the concept of "rettilinea irreversibile," leads to dispersion and dissipation of one's energy.
